content.rendered:
Home

Transform Your Organization

We offer DevOps as a service to optimize your software development process, enhance collaboration, and drive continuous innovation. With us, your business can stay agile and competitive in today’s fast-paced digital landscape.

Contact US

DevOps

Full Process Automation

Minimise issues

Virtualization

Cost saving

Strengthen security

Improve Scalability and Flexibility

We Follow the Best DevOps Practices

At Codevian, we offer DevOps as a service to enable businesses to cultivate a culture of continuous improvement. With the support of our certified engineers, we help shorten time-to-market, improve team cooperation, and optimise software development workflows. What distinguishes us is our unwavering commitment to the best DevOps practices.
  • Continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD)
  • Continuous monitoring
  • Testing automation
  • Configuration management,
  • Following Agile Methodologies
  • Infrastructure as code (IaC)
  • Monitoring the right metrics
  • Integrating security into the development process at the beginning
  • Promoting a collaborative and effective communication culture

DevOps Professional Services We Offer

DevOps Consulting Services

In order to maximise your DevOps journey and promote efficiency for your business, our DevOps consultants evaluate your current processes, create solutions, and suggest best practices.

Staff Augmentation

Boost your development capabilities with our expert and adaptable DevOps engineers who will smoothly merge with your current teams and help in meeting project demands.

IaC Development

We help you utilise the potential of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with our certified DevOps Professionals to manage your infrastructure more consistently & securely and scale up quickly.

CI/CD Implementation

We implement functional & automated pipelines for Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) that speed up software delivery and guarantee flawless code integration in your projects.

DevOps Automation

Our automation solutions organize & automate your routine activities, increasing output and lowering human error — which results in shorter software development cycles and higher software quality.

Container Orchestration

With our Container Orchestration services, take advantage of the flexibility and scalability of container technologies, facilitating effective application deployment and management.

Monitoring and Logging Solutions

We help you stay ahead of potential issues by providing valuable real-time data on your applications' performance, security, and overall health.

DevOps Support

You can rely on our devoted support team for prompt issue response, on-time maintenance, IT support, and ongoing enhancement to make sure your DevOps operations run as smoothly as possible.

Microservices

Our DevOps expertise helps you to implement the flexibility of Microservices architecture. We reduce issues by breaking complicated applications into simple components, improving scalability and continuous deployment.

Platform as a service (Paas)

Our DevOps Engineers offer PaaS integration to enable quick application development and deployment for your organisation by empowering you with simplified workflows, automated deployments, and expandable infrastructure.

Security Integration

Through the seamless integration of security standards, our comprehensive strategy offers strong protection at every level, reducing risks and strengthening your software development lifecycle.

Our DevOps engineers can help you realize the full potential of your software development by offering experienced consulting, easy implementation, and dedicated support. Our years of experience will help you simplify your CI/CD pipelines, automate operations, and improve software quality.

Improving CI/CD Pipeline

A technology company was experiencing software delivery delays, frequent rollbacks, and higher development expenses.

Our experienced DevOps engineers carefully examined their CI/CD pipeline, identified bottlenecks, automated manual operations, and adopted rigorous testing protocols. This resulted in an effective pipeline, which reduced deployment errors dramatically and ultimately saved the business considerable time and resources.

Improving Cross-Functional Collaboration

A Large organization suffers from separated departments and ineffective communication among teams, resulting in project delays and lower productivity.

Our skilled DevOps engineers implemented robust collaboration tools and real-time communication channels. This drastically lowered project delivery times, improved product quality, and increased overall team productivity by promoting a culture of transparency and collaboration.

Implementing Version Control

An IT company was having difficulty maintaining version control across their globally scattered teams. As a result, code conflicts were common, releases were delayed, and collaboration was hampered.

Using Git and continuous integration tools, our experienced DevOps engineers created an effective version control approach. This led to faster development cycles, smoother releases, and increased teamwork, ultimately increasing the efficiency of their software delivery.

Hire our DevOps Engineers

Hiring our DevOps engineers to get access to competent professionals who are well-versed in revolutionary cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and DevOps tools. They have a proven track record of optimizing IT infrastructures, which allows them to accelerate projects, assure smooth operations, and create personalized solutions. Their experience in automation and continuous integration speeds up delivery and increases profitability. With our DevOps engineers on board, you can expect better efficiency, security, and scalability.

Enable faster software delivery

Streamline the development process

Automate manual tasks

Continuous improvement of processe

Our DevOps Process in 8 Steps

01

Assess Current Workflow

  • Understanding your busine

  • Core/Impact Identification

  • Operational Impact Analysis

  • Assessment of current practices and workflows

02

Plan DevOps Strategy

  • Designing the framework

  • Strategizing the Roadmap

  • Process Mapping & Alignment

  • Planning & Assessment

03

DevOps Implementation

  • Process Implementation

  • Tool Integration

  • Sticking to the best practices 

04

CI/CD

  • Continuous Integration

  • Continuous Deployment

  • Real-time Monitoring

  • Rapid Deployment

  • Automated Code Building

05

Develop Automation

  • Process Automation

  • Efficient DeploymentEasy

  • Deployment

06

Monitor and Test

  • Continuous Monitoring

  • Automated Testing

  • Quality Assurance Checks

  • Finding and fixing inefficient processes

07

Security Integration

  • Access Control

  • Secured Transmission

  • Data Encryption

08

Continuous Improvement

  • Final Project Delivery

  • Ongoing Operation

  • Process Enhancement

Our DevOps Engineers’ Competency

1. Expertise in Cloud Platforms

Our DevOps engineers are experts in popular cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud which enable smooth management and scalability of cloud-based infrastructure.

2. Configuration Management

Our DevOps engineers ensure consistent configuration and efficient management of your IT infrastructure due to their proficiency with tools like Ansible and Puppet.

3. Monitoring & Performance Optimization

Our engineers build complete monitoring systems for high application availability, performance optimisation, and proactive issue detection.

4. Security & Compliance

To safeguard your systems and data, our engineers prioritize security best practices, implementing strong safeguards and ensuring compliance with industry standards.

5. Collaboration & Communication

With their exceptional communication and teamwork abilities, our engineers readily integrate with your existing teams to promote collaboration and information sharing.

DevOps Professional Services We Offer

In the rapidly changing world of DevOps, reliable automation tools and platforms are critical for assessing the digital business impact. To ensure a successful DevOps solution, our engineers use a wide range of the latest DevOps tools and platforms.

Continuous Integration/Delivery​

Jenkins

Bitbucket

GitHub

Why Choose Us?

Choose our DevOps services for successful integration of development and operations, assuring timely delivery and ongoing improvement. Our skilled DevOps engineers are dedicated to improving your software development processes, increasing efficiency, and providing excellent results for your company.

Talented DevOps Engineers

Our team of skilled DevOps engineers brings extensive expertise, ensuring smooth automation and optimal deployment pipelines for your projects.

Dedicated DevOps Team

Optimize your operations with our dedicated DevOps team, augmenting your workforce and providing tailored solutions for your specific needs.

No Training or Hiring Costs

Save time and resources as we offer ready-to-go DevOps engineers, eliminating the need for training and costly recruitment processes.

Flexible Engagement Model

Choose from our flexible hiring models, including hourly, part-time, monthly, or project-based, that align with your project requirements and budget.

Exceptional Results

Experience improved efficiency, faster deployment, and superior outcomes as our DevOps services drive excellence throughout your development process.

Smooth Operations

Our engineers Identify and resolve issues, optimize workflows, and enhance operational flow for smooth and streamlined operations.

Don't Let Slow Operations Hold You Back

With our comprehensive DevOps solutions, you can improve efficiency and transform your development process. Start today.

  • Automate
  • Enhance Productivity
  • Deliver Projects Quickly
Start today

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon

CEO at BullHead City web

Great Company This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali

Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian

Dilip Joshi

AVP - IT & Engineering at Shemaroo Entertainment Ltd

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G.

CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian's delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there's any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution

Vinay Darp

CEO at XtentTeam LLP

FAQs

Got a question? Don’t worry! We have the answers you need. Contact us using the form below, and our executives will gladly assist you.

Start today
Will the hired DevOps engineer work only on my project?
Yes, the DevOps engineer you hire will be dedicated solely to your project, ensuring full focus and commitment to its success.
What does a DevOps engineer do?
By bridging the gap between development and operations, a DevOps engineer is in charge of optimising workflow, and ensuring smooth cooperation, which leads to quicker delivery and more effectiveness.
How do I know if I should hire DevOps?

You need to hire DevOps if the growth of your company is obstructed because for many reasons like

  • Frequent delays in the deployment or release of the software.
  • Managing a large and varied infrastructure can be challenging.
  • A lack of effective communication between the operations and development teams.
  • Manual, labour-intensive deployment procedures.
  • There is a need to automate routine chores and workflows.
  • A desire to enhance the scalability and performance of the programme.
Who needs DevOps?
Businesses of all sizes and industries can benefit from DevOps. Whether you are a startup or an enterprise, adopting DevOps practices can improve development efficiency and boost business growth.
How much time does it take to hire your developers?
The length of time it takes to hire our developers is determined by the specifics of your project. We have an effective hiring procedure and adhere to your project timeframes, so you don’t have to worry — we provide you with top talent quickly!
